text: A Midsummer Night's Dream is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by J. Stuart Blackton and Charles Kent and stars Walter Ackerman, Dolores Costello, and Helene Costello. ==Actors== * Walter Ackerman as Demetrius * Dolores Costello as a fairy * Helene Costello as a fairy * Maurice Costello as Lysander * Rose Tapley as Hermia * Julia Swayne Gordon as Helena * Florence Turner as Titania * Gladys Hulette as Puck * Elita Proctor Otis as Hippolyta * William Humphrey * William V. Ranous as Bottom ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1909 movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream (1909 movie)
